requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Processor: 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
